title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Cires21 revolutionized advanced video workflows using AI on AWS (SMB203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cires21如何利用AWS上的AI革新高级视频工作流程 (SMB203)
abstract: This session explores how Cires21's MediaCopilot SaaS solution, built on AWS, uses AI and automation to simplify operations like highlight generation, multilingual subtitling, and automated clipping. By abstracting technical complexities, the platform allows teams to focus on content creation rather than infrastructure. Through AWS's scalable architecture, MediaCopilot empowers SMBs in diverse sectors to enhance customer engagement, training, and communications with professional-quality video content, addressing key challenges of resource limitations and quick deployment without specialized staff or substantial investment.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了Cires21的MediaCopilot SaaS解决方案如何基于AWS构建,利用AI和自动化技术简化高光片段生成、多语言字幕制作和自动剪辑等操作。通过抽象技术复杂性,该平台使团队能够专注于内容创作而非基础设施管理。借助AWS的可扩展架构,MediaCopilot赋能不同行业的中小企业,通过专业级视频内容增强客户参与度、培训和沟通效果,解决了资源限制和快速部署的关键挑战,无需专业人员或大量投资。

presenter.name: Stefano Sandrini
presenter.title: Snr Manager - Europe South SMB SA Leader
